title: l.attrfilter
description: The `l.attrfilter` object in Pure Data (using `pdlua`) filters elements from an SVG file loaded with [`l.readsvg`](l.readsvg.md) based on attributes such as stroke, fill, or ID. For example, `l.attrfilter fill #ff0000` outputs only the elements with red fill (#ff0000). It allows selective processing and visualization of SVG content in Pd.
